mapper.update: update t_wms_inboundbase set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INBOUNDNO = #{inboundno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INBOUNDPLANTIME = #{inboundplantime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, INBOUNDTIME = #{inboundtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUSTEXT = #{statustext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDERID = #{providerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, INBOUNDNO, INBOUNDPLANTIME, INBOUNDTIME, STATUS, STATUSTEXT, PROVIDERID from t_wms_inboundbase where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, INBOUNDNO, INBOUNDPLANTIME, INBOUNDTIME, STATUS, STATUSTEXT, PROVIDERID from t_wms_inboundbase
